name: Tiny Thief (itch)
description:
Tiny thief

Basically this project serves as sandbox to learn how to finalize and publish indie game.  

The game is basically re-write of existing ThiefRL (https://mcneja.itch.io/thiefrl2-2016-7drl) which I really like. ( I even asked author to use the same graphic assets).

Some character sprites are from excellent contributor https://0x72.itch.io/ 

I plan to enhance level generation, different items and enemies plus some additional mechanics like keys and locked doors.

Enjoy. Please keep in mind very early stage of development.
Follow news on https://discordapp.com/channels/703737122942746665/703737122942746668
